author: bencomic

right.text: what kind of chinese name is "skullie"

left.text: is that your real name? skullie?
lol. I thought she was asian

right.text: i can't pronounce Ts too good. it's because my tongue is slightly forked

left.text: that's the best compliment I've ever gotten. so do you speak with an accent? I think girls with accents are hot

title: THE BALLAD OF JOHN JR: Part 16
